title: A Match Made In Heaven [Gems From The Nashville Craigslist]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Craigslist is always the remedy for what ails you. Always. Failed romance? Craigslist can help. 

WANTING TO TRADE BEAUTIFUL WEDDING RING SET FOR A LAPTOP (NASHVILLE AREA)

I have got a 14k beautiful wedding ring set with 12 diamonds in wedding band and 34 diamonds and a .20ct diamond in engagement ring. Very clear diamonds and sparkly. Size 7, shows virtually no signs of wear that I would like to trade for a real nice Laptop or will sell. [redacted]

Thanks to John N. for the tip!
